price: 24. Mise waxay leeyihin: Wuxuu ka been sheegay Alle? Hadduu doono Alle, wuxuu dabooli lahaa qalbigaaga13,  Allena wuu tirtiri  baadilka, kuna sugi xaqa Kelmadihiisa. Hubaal Alle wuu Ogsoon yahay waxa ku jira laabaha (dadka).
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗاۖ فَإِن يَشَإِ ٱللَّهُ يَخۡتِمۡ عَلَىٰ قَلۡبِكَۗ وَيَمۡحُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡبَٰطِلَ وَيُحِقُّ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
footnotes: 13. Wuxuu kaa yeeli karaa inaad illowdo Qur’aanka oo lagu hilmaansiiyo.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban fa-in yasha-i al-lahu yakhtim ʿalā qalbika wayamḥu al-lahu al-bāṭila wayuḥiqqu al-ḥaqa bikalimātihi innahu ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
